price: Àwọn ọ̀dọ́kùnrin tí kò níí gbó yó sì máa lọ bọ̀ láààrin wọn. Nígbà tí ìwọ bá sì rí wọn, ìwọ yóò kà wọ́n kún òkúta olówó iyebíye tí wọ́n fọ́n kalẹ̀.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim wil'dānun mukhalladūna idhā ra-aytahum ḥasib'tahum lu'lu-an manthūran
